original_text: When all the captains of the forces in the open country and their men heard that the king of Babylon had appointed Gedaliah the son of Ahikam governor in the land and had committed to him men, women, and children, those of the poorest of the land who had not been taken into exile to Babylon,
korean_text: 들에 있는 모든 지휘관과 그 부하들이 바벨론의 왕이 아히감의 아들 그다랴에게 그 땅을 맡기고 남녀와 유아1)와 바벨론으로 잡혀가지 아니한 빈민을 그에게 위임하였다 함을 듣고

the son of Ahikam governor in the land
and had committed to him men, women, and children,
